Microsoft Visual C++ Redistributable is not installed, this may lead to the DLL load failure.
                 It can be downloaded at https://aka.ms/vs/16/release/vc_redist.x64.exe

say_hello[source]

say_hello(to)

Say hello to somebody

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %}

Use this to say hello to anyone

{% raw %} 
say_hello("Daniel")

'Hello Daniel!'
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
test_eq(say_hello("Daniel"), "Hello Daniel!")
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class HelloSayer[source]

HelloSayer(to)

Say hello to to using say_hello

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

HelloSayer.say[source]

HelloSayer.say()

{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
o = HelloSayer("Alexis")
o.say()

'Hello Alexis!'
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

dummy[source]

dummy(file='Hallo')

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class Recommender[source]

Recommender(p_learn, a_learn, playlists)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class Ranking[source]

Ranking(track_uri, artist_uri, rating, pid)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

sigmoid[source]

sigmoid(input, eps=1e-07)

Same as torch.sigmoid, plus clamping to `(eps,1-eps)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
